author: winnsterx
content: Hi! I am a research engineer at a crypto asset management firm based in SF. I am trying to learn more about what Ethereum is today and where it will be in the future!

author: fakedev9999
content: Hi guys I'm a blockchain core developer at PDAO & blockchain researcher from Seoul. My research interests are blockchain storages, blockchain core and I'm currently interested in Verkle Trees.

author: fakedev9999
content: Nice to meet you here, one of your followers! Your contents are super intuitive!!
